alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:08PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wayne County through 930 PM CDT... At 908 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles south of Wayne, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Wayne County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
